attributes.action: Support the vote to get out of Europe
attributes.background:
The majority of British people on the street are unhappy with us being dictated to by Europe.
I want us to start having a say what is going on in our Country.
What has our membership to Europe ever done for this Country I want people to vote us out if and when we get a referendum.

rejection.details:
We cannot accept duplicate petitions. We think this petition is similar to yours:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/105863

You might like to sign this petition instead. It is more likely to get more signatures that way.
